antcolony
Class Heap

java.lang.Object
  antcolony.Heap

public class Heap
extends java.lang.Object

The Heap class represents an heap of items as is defined in the AntClass paper. The class stores all the items but also some metrics of the heap, namely:

  • Most dissimilar item
  • The heap center
  • The maximum dissimilarity between items

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.6
Author:
António Fonseca
